actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend title XVI of the Social Security Act to permit the exclusion from the resources of an individual certain amounts set aside to defray such individual's funeral and burial expenses.

summary.text: Permits, under title XVI (Supplemental Security Benefits) of the Social Security Act, the exclusion from the resources of an individual specified amounts set aside as a trust account to defray such individual's funeral and burial expenses.

titles.title: A bill to amend title XVI of the Social Security Act to permit the exclusion from the resources of an individual certain amounts set aside to defray such individual's funeral and burial expenses.
